items.sentence: Tom said that Mary seemed somewhat confused.
Every bride is beautiful on her wedding day.
Tom wanted to get married, but Mary didn\'t.
I don\'t understand why you want to do that.
I didn\'t think Tom would have any problems.
I didn\'t think that was supposed to happen.
I didn\'t understand a single word Tom said.
I didn\'t want to do what Tom told me to do.
Mary hardly ever kisses her husband anymore.
Mary is no longer the shy girl she once was.
Mary is saving money so she can go to Japan.
Mary is still wearing the ring Tom gave her.
These kinds of problems are relatively rare.
These problems must be dealt with carefully.
They accused me of having broken my promise.
They advised me to go to the police station.
All of my students call me by my first name.
Before buying shoes, you should try them on.
Did you learn to swim when you were a child?
I think that what you did was inappropriate.
